get.description: List the operations for the provider

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: properties

get.description: List WorkloadImpact resources by subscription ID

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Get Insight resources by workloadImpactName and insightName

put.description: Create Insight resource, This is Admin only operation

delete.description: Delete Insight resource, This is Admin only operation

ClientIncidentDetails.description: Client incident details ex: incidentId , incident source

clientIncidentId.description: Client incident id. ex : id of the incident created to investigate and address the impact if any.

clientIncidentSource.description: Client incident source. ex : source system name where the incident is created

ConfidenceLevel.description: Degree of confidence on the impact being a platform issue.

values.name: Low
values.description: Low confidence on azure being the source of impact

values.name: Medium
values.description: Medium confidence on azure being the source of impact

values.name: High
values.description: High confidence on azure being the source of impact

Connectivity.description: Details about connectivity issue. Applicable when root resource causing the issue is not identified. For example, when a VM is impacted due to a network issue, the impacted resource could be VM or the network. In such cases, the connectivity field will have the details about both VM and network.

source.description: Source from which the connection was attempted

Connector.description: A connector is a resource that can be used to proactively report impacts against workloads in Azure to Microsoft.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ConnectorListResult.description: The response of a Connector list operation.

value.description: The Connector items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

lastRunTimeStamp.description: last run time stamp of this connector in UTC time zone

ConnectorUpdate.description: A connector is a resource that can be used to proactively report impacts against workloads in Azure to Microsoft.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

Content.description: Article details of the insight like title, description etc

ErrorDetailProperties.description: ARM error code and error message associated with the impact

errorCode.description: ARM Error code associated with the impact.

errorMessage.description: ARM Error Message associated with the impact

ExpectedValueRange.description: Max and Min Threshold values for the metric

min.description: Min threshold value for the metric

max.description: Max threshold value for the metric

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ImpactCategoryListResult.description: The response of a ImpactCategory list operation.

value.description: The ImpactCategory items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

parentCategoryId.description: Unique ID of the parent category

requiredImpactProperties.description: The workloadImpact properties which are required when reporting with the impact category

ImpactDetails.description: details of of the impact for which insight has been generated.

startTime.description: Time at which impact was started according to reported impact.

endTime.description: Time at which impact was ended according to reported impact.

values.name: AzureDevops
values.description: When source of Incident is AzureDevops

values.name: ICM
values.description: When source of Incident is Microsoft ICM

values.name: Jira
values.description: When source of Incident is Jira

values.name: ServiceNow
values.description: When source of Incident is ServiceNow

values.name: Other
values.description: When source of Incident is Other

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

InsightCustomResourceCommonParameters.description: context of post call for insight

apiVersion.description: The API version to use for this operation.

subscriptionId.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

provider.description: The provider namespace for the resource.

InsightDetails.description: Body of the get all insights

azureResourceId.description: The ID of the azure resource.

InsightListResult.description: The response of a Insight list operation.

value.description: The Insight items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

status.description: status of the insight. example resolved, repaired, other.

eventId.description: Identifier of the event that has been correlated with this insight. This can be used to aggregate insights for the same event.

groupId.description: Identifier that can be used to group similar insights.

content.description: Contains title & description for the insight

eventTime.description: Time of the event, which has been correlated the impact.

impact.description: details of of the impact for which insight has been generated.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

MetricUnit.description: List of unit of the metric.

values.name: Other
values.description: When measurement is in Other than listed

Performance.description: Details about impacted performance metrics. Applicable for performance related impact

metricName.description: Name of the Metric examples:  Disk, IOPs, CPU, GPU, Memory, details can be found from /impactCategories API

expectedValueRange.description: Max and Min Threshold values for the metric

unit.description: Unit of the metric ex: Bytes, Percentage, Count, Seconds, Milliseconds, Bytes/Second, Count/Second, etc.., Other

allowedValues.description: Allowed values values for the property

toolset.description: Tool used to interact with Azure. SDK, AzPortal, etc.., Other

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

WorkloadImpactListResult.description: The response of a WorkloadImpact list operation.

value.description: The WorkloadImpact items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

startDateTime.description: Time at which impact was observed

endDateTime.description: Time at which impact has ended

impactedResourceId.description: Azure resource id of the impacted resource

reportedTimeUtc.description: Time at which impact is reported

impactCategory.description: Category of the impact,  details can found from /impactCategories API

impactDescription.description: A detailed description of the impact

armCorrelationIds.description: The ARM correlation ids, this is important field for control plane related impacts

performance.description: Details about performance issue. Applicable for performance impacts.

connectivity.description: Details about connectivity issue. Applicable when root resource causing the issue is not identified. For example, when a VM is impacted due to a network issue, the impacted resource is identified as the VM, but the root cause is the network. In such cases, the connectivity field will have the details about the network issue

additionalProperties.description: Additional fields related to impact, applicable fields per resource type are list under /impactCategories API

errorDetails.description: ARM error code and error message associated with the impact

impactGroupId.description: Use this field to group impacts

confidenceLevel.description: Degree of confidence on the impact being a platform issue

clientIncidentDetails.description: Client incident details ex: incidentId , incident source
